sentence.Network_en: The coziness of having a friend is warm always.

sentence.Network_en: A fireplace lends coziness and cheer to a room.

sentence.Network_en: As for our house, it was all edges glass inside , without a single concession to coziness.
sentence.Network_cn: 至于我家住的房子,室内处处棱角分明, 清冷如水, 没有一丝舒适感.
